crosshair_desc: Choose whether or not the game crosshair is enabled
duiDisabled_desc: Choose to disable whether or not the safezone screen is enabled
deathMessage_desc: Set your custom death message (for gold/diamond)
zombieScreams_desc: Choose whether or not zombie screams are enabled
hitmarkerSoundEnabled_desc: Choose whether or not hitmarker sounds are enabled
hitmarkerEnabled_desc: Choose whether or not hitmarker visuals numbers are enabled
killfeedEnabled_desc: Choose whether or not the killfeed is displayed
voiceChatEnabled_desc: Disable or enable the in-game voice chat
antizinDisableZombieSpawn_desc: Disable or enable zombie spawning with antizin
disableStatusHud_desc: Disable Extinction's custom status HUD (armor, health, ammo)
fpsBoost_desc: Reduce the visual settings and render distance of your game to automatically gain FPS
killSoundEffectEnabled_desc: Choose whether or not kill sound effect is enabled
interfaceOpacity_desc: Sets the opacity of the interface
interfaceItemStyle_desc: Sets the style of the inventory items
hitmarkerSoundVolume_desc: Defines the volume of the hitmarkers. Default: 50%.
visualPresets_desc: Enable custom visual settings. Good for FPS boost and PVP settings.
editvisualPresets_desc: Open the visual presets edit menu. Use /visualMenu for quick access.
visual_timecycle_desc: Select the timecycle you want to play with. Good for FPS boost and PVP settings.
visual_wind_desc: Disable wind direction and other wind game effects.
defaultSpawnLoadout_desc: Choose whether or not you spawn with the default Extinction weapons and vehicles
voiceDeathEnabled_desc: Choose if you want to activate your microphone when you die.
voiceDisabledOnSafezone_desc: Choose to disable voice chat in the Safezone
